org.jcatapult.mvc.parameter.convert.converters
Class CollectionConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.mvc.parameter.convert.AbstractGlobalConverter
      org.jcatapult.mvc.parameter.convert.converters.CollectionConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
GlobalConverter
public class CollectionConverter
extends AbstractGlobalConverter

This converts to and from Collection types. This handles complex parameterized types by first creating the Collection instance (ArrayList, HashSet, LinkedList, etc) and then by leveraging the other converters for the parameterized type.

public CollectionConverter(ConverterProvider provider)
Method Detail

stringToObject

protected Object stringToObject(String value,
                                Type convertTo,
                                Map<String,String> dynamicAttributes)
                         throws ConversionException,
                                ConverterStateException
Creates the correct collection type and then converts the value String to the parameterized type (if one exists) and then adds it. If there is no parameterized type, this just shoves the String value in the collection.

Specified by:
stringToObject in class AbstractGlobalConverter
Parameters:
value - The value.
convertTo - The type to convert to.
dynamicAttributes - The dynamic attributes used to assist in conversion.
Returns:
The converted value.
Throws:
ConversionException - If the conversion failed.
ConverterStateException - if the converter didn't have all of the information it needed to perform the conversion.

stringsToObject

protected Object stringsToObject(String[] values,
                                 Type convertTo,
                                 Map<String,String> dynamicAttributes)
                          throws ConversionException,
                                 ConverterStateException
Creates the correct collection type and then converts the value Strings to the parameterized type (if one exists) and then adds each one. If there is no parameterized type, this just shoves the String values in the collection.

Specified by:
stringsToObject in class AbstractGlobalConverter
Parameters:
values - The values.
convertTo - The type to convert to.
dynamicAttributes - The dynamic attributes used to assist in conversion.
Returns:
The converted value.
Throws:
ConversionException - If the conversion failed.
ConverterStateException - if the converter didn't have all of the information it needed to perform the conversion.

objectToString

protected String objectToString(Object value,
                                Type convertFrom,
                                Map<String,String> dynamicAttributes)
                         throws ConversionException,
                                ConverterStateException
Iterates over the given collection and converts each collection item to a String based on the parameterized type. If there is no parameterized type, this just joins the collection.

Specified by:
objectToString in class AbstractGlobalConverter
Parameters:
value - The value.
convertFrom - The type to convert from.
dynamicAttributes - The dynamic attributes used to assist in conversion.
Returns:
The converted value.
Throws:
ConversionException - If the conversion failed.
ConverterStateException - if the converter didn't have all of the information it needed to perform the conversion.

makeCollection

protected Collection makeCollection(Class<?> type)
Creates a new instance of the given collection type. If this type is a collection interface, the most common implementation is created. Otherwise, the type is instantiated directly. If that fails, this conversion will fail.

Parameters:
type - The type of collection.
Returns:
The new collection.
